divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside looking for the northern lights associated with the solar flares of recent. I noticed a bright white object coming over the trees at a fast clip. the object did not make any noise and had flashing white lights it sped acros sthe sky from the southwest to the northeast. I lost sight of the object on the horizon. the object appeared to be triangular and white.
Summary: white triangular object in sky over Mobile, AL
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Mobile
There were no other sightings in Mobile on or around October 24th 2003
